metadata.synopsis: Idle AD for sobbing debtor, FireDebtor03
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Talk to Hope in House of Hope and promise to helpteleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_HopeIntroduction_Trigger3. Stand near to Eternal Debtorteleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_FireDebtor03

0.speaker: Shameful Eternal Debtor
0.text: Don't look at me... don't look at me.
0.context: NodeContext: distressed, talking to himself, losing grip on reality

1.speaker: Shameful Eternal Debtor
1.text: Shouldn't be here... none of us should.
1.context: NodeContext: distressed, talking to himself, losing grip on reality

2.speaker: Shameful Eternal Debtor
2.context: NodeContext: distressed, talking to himself, losing grip on reality

3.speaker: Shameful Eternal Debtor
3.text: How do I still owe so much?
3.context: NodeContext: distressed, talking to himself, losing grip on reality
